sentences.english: Whole Xuchang will also build up a flowers and trees variety completely.
sentences.chinese: 整個許昌市還將建成花木品種齊全。

sentences.english: The water resource of Xuchang city is being short severely and is polluted seriously.
sentences.chinese: 許昌市水資源嚴重短缺，而且水污染嚴重。

sentences.english: Thank you, Xuchang pass Yashi, Shu have no knowledge poet.
sentences.chinese: 多謝許昌傳雅什，蜀都曾未識詩人。

sentences.english: Wanli Group take part in Xuchang spring festival entertainment programme of transportation system.
sentences.chinese: 萬里集團參加許昌市交通系統春節文藝晚會演出。

sentences.english: Wanli Group take part in the chorus competition of Xuchang city and win the gold prize.
sentences.chinese: 萬里集團參加許昌市合唱比賽並榮獲金獎。

sentences.english: Thank you to the city of Xuchang.
Xuchang and Luoyang come to the junction, the sun has been downhill.
sentences.chinese: 走到許昌和洛陽的交界處，太陽已經落山了。

sentences.english: Assuredly the old General is in trouble at the capital.
sentences.chinese: 莫非老將軍在許昌有事否？

sentences.english: Xuchang yuchang stock farming co. ltd.
sentences.chinese: 許昌裕昌畜牧有限公司。
